titleStmt.title: The true manner of the life and death of Sir Thomas Wentworth, late Lord Lievtenant deputy of Ireland, Lord Generall of his Majesties army, knight of the noble Order of the Garter, who was beheaded the 12. day of this present moneth of May, 1641, the rune is Welladay Welladae.
titleStmt.author: L. P. (Laurence Price), fl. 1625-1680?

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Richard Burton, and are to be sold at the horse shooe at the hospitall gate in Smithfield,

notesStmt.note: In four columns with two woodcuts over the columns.
Year of publication from Wing CD-ROM, 1996.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the horse shooe at the hospitall gate in Smithfield
